languages.text: Команда Вольного Торговца вновь наткнулась на разграбленное судно с древними машинами. На сей раз техножрецы ревностно досмотрели каждую шестерню, однако смогли добыть лишь очередную крупицу археотечного механизма. Быть может, где-то в Просторе есть еще корабли, подобные этому.

traits.locale_text: Команда Вольного Торговца вновь наткнулась на разграбленное судно с древними машинами. На сей раз техножрецы ревностно досмотрели каждую шестерню, однако смогли добыть лишь очередную крупицу археотечного механизма. Быть может, где-то в Коронусе есть еще корабли, подобные этому.

languages.text: The Rogue Trader's crew once again came across the plundered vessel containing the ancient machines. This time, Tech-Priests greedily inspected everything down to the last cog, but all they were able to scavenge was another fragment of the archeotech mechanism. Perhaps somewhere in the Expanse there are more ships like this one.
languages.original_text: Команда Вольного Торговца вновь наткнулась на разграбленное судно с древними машинами. На сей раз техножрецы ревностно досмотрели каждую шестерню, однако смогли добыть лишь очередную крупицу археотечного механизма. Быть может, где-то в Просторе есть еще корабли, подобные этому.

traits.locale_text: The Rogue Trader's crew once again came across the plundered vessel containing the ancient machines. This time, Tech-Priests greedily inspected everything down to the last cog, but all they were able to scavenge was another fragment of the archeotech mechanism. Perhaps somewhere in the Koronus there are more ships like this one.

The Rogue Trader's crew once again came across the plundered vessel containing the ancient machines. This time, Tech-Priests greedily inspected everything down to the last cog, but all they were able to scavenge was another fragment of the archeotech mechanism. Perhaps somewhere in the Koronus there are more ships like this one.

The Rogue Trader's crew once again came across the plundered vessel containing the ancient machines. This time, Tech-Priests greedily inspected everything down to the last cog, but all they were able to scavenge was another fragment of the archeotech mechanism. Perhaps somewhere in the Koronus there are more ships like this one.

The Rogue Trader's crew once again came across the plundered vessel containing the ancient machines. This time, Tech-Priests greedily inspected everything down to the last cog, but all they were able to scavenge was another fragment of the archeotech mechanism. Perhaps somewhere in the Expanse there are more ships like this one.

languages.text: 行商浪人的船员再次遇到了遭到掠夺的舰船，舰船上装载着远古机械。技术神甫们贪婪地检查了所有的东西，连一个齿轮也没有放过，不过他们仅仅找到了某件远古科技造物的碎片。或许在科罗努斯扩区的某些区域，还有能找到像这样的舰船。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew once again came across the plundered vessel containing the ancient machines. This time, Tech-Priests greedily inspected everything down to the last cog, but all they were able to scavenge was another fragment of the archeotech mechanism. Perhaps somewhere in the Expanse there are more ships like this one.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人的船员再次遇到了遭到掠夺的舰船，舰船上装载着远古机械。技术祭司们贪婪地检查了所有的东西，连一个齿轮也没有放过，不过他们仅仅找到了某件远古科技造物的碎片。或许在科罗努斯扩区的某些区域，还有能找到像这样的舰船。

languages.text: 自由開拓者のクルーは再び、古代の機械を積んだ略奪された船に遭遇した。今回、技術司祭は最後の歯車に至るまですべてを貪欲に検査したが、彼らが回収できたのは技術遺産のメカニズムのもう1つの断片だけだった。エクスパンスのどこかに、他にもこのような船があるのかもしれない。
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew once again came across the plundered vessel containing the ancient machines. This time, Tech-Priests greedily inspected everything down to the last cog, but all they were able to scavenge was another fragment of the archeotech mechanism. Perhaps somewhere in the Expanse there are more ships like this one.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者のクルーは再び、古代の機械を積んだ略奪された船に遭遇した。今回、技術司祭は最後の歯車に至るまですべてを貪欲に検査したが、彼らが回収できたのは技術遺産のメカニズムのもう1つの断片だけだった。エクスパンスのどこかに、他にもこのような船があるのかもしれない。

languages.text: La tripulación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente una vez más se ha cruzado con el navío saqueado que albergaba máquinas antiguas. Esta vez, los tecnosacerdotes han inspeccionado con avaricia hasta el último engranaje, pero lo único que han podido recuperar es otro fragmento de arqueotecnología. Tal vez haya más naves similares en la Extensión.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew once again came across the plundered vessel containing the ancient machines. This time, Tech-Priests greedily inspected everything down to the last cog, but all they were able to scavenge was another fragment of the archeotech mechanism. Perhaps somewhere in the Expanse there are more ships like this one.

traits.locale_text: La tripulación de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente una vez más se ha cruzado con el navío saqueado que albergaba máquinas antiguas. Esta vez, los tecnosacerdotes han inspeccionado con avaricia hasta el último engranaje, pero lo único que han podido recuperar es otro fragmento de arqueotecnología. Tal vez haya más naves similares en la Extensión.

languages.text: Die Crew {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ist erneut auf das geplünderte Schiff mit den alten Maschinen gestoßen. Die Techpriester jedes noch so kleine Zahnrad eingehend untersucht, aber alles, was sie fanden, war ein weiteres Fragment der Archäotech-Mechanismus. Vielleicht gibt es irgendwo in der Ausdehnung weitere Schiffe wie dieses.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew once again came across the plundered vessel containing the ancient machines. This time, Tech-Priests greedily inspected everything down to the last cog, but all they were able to scavenge was another fragment of the archeotech mechanism. Perhaps somewhere in the Expanse there are more ships like this one.

traits.locale_text: Die Crew {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ist erneut auf das geplünderte Schiff mit den alten Maschinen gestoßen. Die Techpriester jedes noch so kleine Zahnrad eingehend untersucht, aber alles, was sie fanden, war ein weiteres Fragment der Archäotech-Mechanismus. Vielleicht gibt es irgendwo in der Ausdehnung weitere Schiffe wie dieses.

languages.text: L'équipage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} a de nouveau croisé le vaisseau pillé contenant les machines antiques. Cette fois, les technoprêtres ont tout inspecté jusqu'au dernier rouage, mais ils n'ont pu récupérer qu'un autre fragment du mécanisme archéotechnologique. Peut-être existe-t-il d'autres vaisseaux comme celui-ci, ailleurs dans les Étendues.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew once again came across the plundered vessel containing the ancient machines. This time, Tech-Priests greedily inspected everything down to the last cog, but all they were able to scavenge was another fragment of the archeotech mechanism. Perhaps somewhere in the Expanse there are more ships like this one.

traits.locale_text: L'équipage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} a de nouveau croisé le vaisseau pillé contenant les machines antiques. Cette fois, les technoprêtres ont tout inspecté jusqu'au dernier rouage, mais ils n'ont pu récupérer qu'un autre fragment du mécanisme archéotechnologique. Peut-être existe-t-il d'autres vaisseaux comme celui-ci, ailleurs dans les Étendues.

languages.text: Hür Tacir'in mürettebatı bir kez daha kadim makinelere ev sahipliği yapan, yağmalanmış bir gemiye denk geldi. Tekno Rahipler, bu kez büyük bir hırsla en ufak dişliye kadar her şeyi incelese de tek bulabildikleri, arkeotek mekanizmasının başka bir parçası oldu. Belki Enginlik'te bir yerlerde bunun gibi başka gemiler de vardır.
languages.original_text: The Rogue Trader's crew once again came across the plundered vessel containing the ancient machines. This time, Tech-Priests greedily inspected everything down to the last cog, but all they were able to scavenge was another fragment of the archeotech mechanism. Perhaps somewhere in the Expanse there are more ships like this one.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir'in mürettebatı bir kez daha kadim makineler içeren, yağmalanmış bir gemiye denk geldi. Bu kez Tekno Rahipler büyük bir hırsla en ufak dişliye kadar her şeyi incelediler ancak tek bulabildikleri, arkeotek mekanizmasının başka bir parçasıydı. Belki Enginlik'te bir yerlerde bunun gibi başka gemiler de vardır.
